column2: Linda, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: I had a major headache and I'm not one for medicine but I went and tried every over the counter medication for headaches to ones that specified migraine.. and none worked ... Finally went to the doctor after the pain got so intense I couldn't walk and was sick that he gave me Flextra and after a short period of taking it it was gone .. I will stand by this one..

column9: I received numerous other treatments for my fibromyalgia, including darvocet and a few other drugs.  None of them provided relief as well as the flextra plus.

column2: Happy, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I was given Flextra Plus for headaches. If I catch it at the onset one pill will work, even helps a little for neck pain, otherwise two.  And NO narcotic, can't go wrong. I don't know if it would be strong enough for a migraine? I would certainly recommend trying this.

column2: nfwgh, 75 or over Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I have muscle stiffness in my neck. I take only one before bedtime and it keeps me from having pain in my neck at night.
